"Ah! Hey, thanks for all your help!": "Thanks to you, the ship doesn't have a single scratch on it, and the repairs are perfect too! Everything's gonna be alright!"
"We are truly grateful to you for helping us with anything and everything, even though you didn't even know us."
"Emilia and I were thinking that, at the very least, there must be something we can do to thank you."
"Hah, that lack of desire in you makes you sound just like my old partner. It's amazing, but also a bit of a shame..."
"But look, even if you say you don't need a thank-you, we feel like we're in your debt!"
"We will be absolutely sure to repay you someday. If you ever run into trouble, please call us anytime."
"We're gonna return home in just a bit, but we already have this location's coordinates and so on completely memorized!"
"So we can come back here whenever we want!"
"Our time together may have been short, but we're all friends here now! So don't you ever hesitate to call on us!"
"I am so thankful for all that you've done."
